resources.string: Habit building is a process based on what you do repeatedly. It takes, on average, 66 days to build a habit. Given the time and commitment required, it is difficult to maintain the motivation to keep going.
Small Steps aims to help you build habits by focusing on small steps. It is based on the ideas of The 3 Râ€™s of Habit Change: Reminder, Routine, and Reward.

A Reminder is the trigger that initiates the behavior.

A Routine is the behavior, itself.

A Reward is the benefit gained from performing the behavior.
This app uses Reminders to trigger Routines to earn Rewards.
With this process, small steps build big habits!
